医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
远程医疗和初级保健提供者提供有效的糖尿病治疗马萨诸塞州综合医院的科罗拉多大学安索斯大学医学校园和同事的研究人员发现，糖尿病患者在接受初级保健提供者（PCP）培训时，可以使用先进的胰岛素技术在其初级保健提供者（PCPS）或通过远程医疗来取得相同的积极结果亲自的专家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/telehealth-and-primary-care-providers-deliver-efferceptive-daibetes-wareatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/telehealth-and-and-primary-care-providers-deliver-effervice-daibetes-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09b49ec0-d9d4-4ea5-b5e8-9bea674b2ce5 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 13:18:47 -0500 Telehealth and primary care providers deliver effective diabetes treatment
CMV感染发现早产儿的坏死性小肠结肠炎恶化研究人员说，他们发现在出生前可以从母亲传播到胎儿的常见病毒感染会使经常致命的早产并发症在小鼠实验中称为坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/cmv-infection-found-found-to-worsen-necrotizing-encrotizing-enterocolitis-inpreterm-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/cmv-infection-found-found-to-worsen-necrotizing-encrotizing-enterocolitis-in-reterm-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42ec4d55-add0-4721-8b19-250348043d57 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 13:13:28 -0500 CMV infection found to worsen necrotizing enterocolitis in preterm infants
新药Ataciguat显示出管理主动脉瓣狭窄的希望主动脉瓣狭窄（AVS）是一个重大的健康问题，影响了超过150万美国人和全球数百万的美国人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-drug-ataciguat-shows-shows-promise-for-managing-managing-aortic-valve-stenosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-drug-ataciguat-shows-shows-promise-formise-for-managing-managing-aortic-valve-stenosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97E32126-6380-41FF-95AD-1B9116000BF3 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 13:07:13 -0500 New drug ataciguat shows promise for managing aortic valve stenosis
财务压力与倦怠和工作不满有关工作压力通常会使人们感到疲倦和不知所措。根据佐治亚大学的一项新研究，生活的其他地方的焦虑会使情况变得更糟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/financial-stress-linked-to-burnout-and-and-job-dissatifaction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/financial-stress-linked-to-burnout-and-and-job-dissatifaction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8183276b-97ea-4469-8CEA-02BFB6C12395 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 12:49:51 -0500 Financial stress linked to burnout and job dissatisfaction
与炎症免疫变化和健康风险有关的睡眠中断新的研究揭示了对睡眠质量对人免疫系统的影响的见解，以及如何将其与肥胖，糖尿病和心血管疾病等疾病的发展联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/sleep-disruption-linked-to-inflammatory-mmmune-changes-changes-changes-and-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/sleep-disruption-linked-to-inflammatory-mmmune-changes-changes-and-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B3453326-1A6C-414A-8520-A16A29A49795 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 12:43:20 -0500 Sleep disruption linked to inflammatory immune changes and health risks
创新的CTDNA模型可以改善癌症进展监测在转移性癌症监测中，监测循环肿瘤DNA（CTDNA）的实际浓度可能至关重要。研究人员表明，可以定义绝对的ctDNA浓度阈值以排除或预测即将来临的癌症进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/innovative-ctdna-model-could-improve-cancer-cancer-progression-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/innovative-ctdna-model-could-improve-cancer-cancer-progression-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=648f05b4-08dd-4db8-9e98-1e98-1e89da0914b8 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 12:30:00 -0500 Innovative ctDNA model could improve cancer progression monitoring

远程医疗的采用导致较少的低价值医疗测试低价值的护理测试和程序几乎没有对患者的医疗支出以及对患者的直接和级联危害几乎没有好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/telemedicine-adoption-leads-to-fewer-low-value-medical-tespxs.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/telemedicine-adoption-leads-to-fewer-low-value-medical-medical-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48d8dbe2-2-2fb6-43d7-ba5f-4C270F802F18 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 12:05:35 -0500 Telemedicine adoption leads to fewer low-value medical tests
了解FDA的投诉报告系统如果您对美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）监管的产品有投诉，则该机构希望听到有关该产品的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/understanding-fdae28099s-complaint-reporting-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/understanding-fdae28099s-complaint-reporting-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=546A104A-3866-46AF-A2C2-D0EFC590B354 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 11:06:35 -0500 Understanding FDA’s complaint reporting systems
研究找到了未来癌症治疗的关键p53目标一份新的研究论文发表在2025年2月18日的《 Oncotarget》第16卷中，标题为“强大的P53表型和前瞻性下游靶标在端粒脱落的人类细胞中”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-key-p53-targets-for-for-for-for-future-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-key-p53-targets-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88fcf99b-4eed-4EED-4323-8601-E9D0C3919230 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 11:03:01 -0500 Study finds key p53 targets for future cancer treatment
